title: Dominion matchup system is broken
body:
Look, I understand that there aren't much dominion players, but I don't care about longer que time since it's longer than summoner's rift anyway.
3 mins or 10 mins doesn't really mean any differences to me.
So can you stop matching me with first time dominion players over and over after I have 200 games of dominion experience already?
I'm not judging by their behavior, I heard many of them said, or, typed with their own hands that they are completely new to this mode, and this does not happen occasionally, this happens literally 80% of the time.

Seriously even if that's 20 mins' que I'll take it, but stop giving me first time teammates, it's way more painful than even an hour's waiting on que.


This topic is removed from "report a bug"
**Okay**
SO It's not a bug.
200 games experienced player are meant to team up with completely new players, this is legit to Riotï¼Œ **OKAY**
Have you ever imagined how frustrating it is???
You are literally creating anger and toxic among your users with you own hands if you intended to do this.
